description:
In this series, we shall go through all the basics and fundamentals of Servlets and JSPs. You will gain all what is required to start building your own, next big idea.

By the end of this course, you will be trained on a practical application using all the knowledge thought throughout the course.

We will be using Apache Tomcat web server and eclipse IDE.

please beware that this course is not meant to be a java tutorial, and basic knowledge of java is required.
title: Learn Java by building Servlets and JSPs applications
